Interface IUserProfile

All Known Implementing Classes:
Applicant, Manager, Officer
public interface IUserProfile
Interface representing a user profile in the system. Provides essential personal and authentication-related methods that any user (e.g., applicant, officer, manager) should implement.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getAge()
    Retrieves the age of the user.
    MaritalStatus
    getMaritalStatus()
    Retrieves the marital status of the user.
    String
    getName()
    Retrieves the full name of the user.
    String
    getNric()
    Retrieves the NRIC of the user.
    String
    getPassword()
    Retrieves the user's password.
